name: Binary Semantics Limited
overview: Binary Semantics Limited, an offshore software development company, provides application engineering and implementation, product engineering, and consulting services in India and internationally. The company develops, integrates, and manages enterprise applications. It offers e-business solutions, such as e-publishing, e-commerce, e-service, and e-integration; and product engineering services, including porting, support, bug fixing, patch and release management, enhancements, tools and utilities, performance measurement and tuning, and third party software integration. The company also provides application development services, which include feasibility study, architecture design, functional specifications, prototyping, coding, testing, training, conversion, integration, installation, and maintenance; and optimization solutions, including planning and scheduling, forecast demand and measure forecast accuracy, inventory planning, transportation planning, and component and supplier management. In addition, it offers software development and Web application development solutions, as well as on-site software development and consultancy services. Binary Semantics serves clients in various sectors, including automotive, consumer products, banking and insurance, consulting, chemicals and pharmaceuticals, educational fraternities, research institutes, hospitality and travel, information technology, manufacturing, services, telecom, and Web services. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Gurgaon, India. Binary Semantics Limited operates as a subsidiary of Megasys Consulting Inc.
